text: The Chesapeake Bay Bridge–Tunnel (CBBT) is a combination bridge and tunnel in the U.S. state of Virginia. It is long. It crosses the mouth of the Chesapeake Bay. It connects the Delmarva Peninsula's eastern shore with Virginia Beach and the metropolitan area of Hampton Roads, Virginia. ==Sources== Category:Bridges in the United States Category:Transport in Virginia Category:1964 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Virginia Category:1999 establishments in the United States
title: Chesapeake Bay Bridge–Tunnel
